title: Veronika Burian
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130920205414/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20130920205414/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Veronika Burian**

Received a MA in Typeface Design, from the [University of Reading](http://web.archive.org/web/20130920205414/http:/typophile.com/wiki/University%20of%20Reading) in 2003. Founded [TypeTogether](http://web.archive.org/web/20130920205414/http:/typophile.com/wiki/TypeTogether) with [José Scaglione](http://web.archive.org/web/20130920205414/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jose%20Scaglione) in 2006.

**Typefaces**  
 [FF Maiola](http://web.archive.org/web/20130920205414/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FF%20Maiola)  
 [Ronnia](http://web.archive.org/web/20130920205414/http:/www.type-together.com/Ronnia)  
 [Karmina](http://web.archive.org/web/20130920205414/http:/www.type-together.com/Karmina)  
 [Adelle](http://web.archive.org/web/20130920205414/http:/www.type-together.com/Adelle)  
 [Bree](http://web.archive.org/web/20130920205414/http:/www.type-together.com/Bree)  
 [Crete](http://web.archive.org/web/20130920205414/http:/www.type-together.com/Crete)  
 [Karmina Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20130920205414/http:/www.type-together.com/Karmina%20Sans)  
 [Athelas](http://web.archive.org/web/20130920205414/http:/www.type-together.com/Athelas)  
Tondo  
Foco

author: paul d hunt
